sources.title: A Matter of Faith (Full Length Movie German, New Movies German Complete 2023, Christian Movies)

metadata.Plot: A Christian girl goes off to college for her freshman year and begins to be influenced by her popular Biology professor who teaches that evolution is the answer to the origins of life. When her father suspects something happening, he begins to examine the situation and what he discovers completely catches him off guard. Now very concerned about his daughter drifting away from the faith, he tries to do something about it.
metadata.Actors: Jordan Trovillion, Jay Pickett, Harry Anderson
